newsitem.title: USA: Garden Botanika Q3 same store sales flat.
newsitem.headline: Garden Botanika Q3 same store sales flat.

text.p: Garden Botanika Inc, a retailer of botanic cosmetic and personal care products, said on Monday its same store sales for the third quarter ended November 2, were flat when compared to the year ago quarter.
Earlier, the company reported total third quarter sales of $17.7 million, a 66 percent rise from $10.7 million last year.

"Although our comparable store sales were flat, there were a number of positive aspects to the third quarter," President Michael Luce said in a statement. He added a direct marketing campaign continues to positively impact stores in November.

Other positive results from the third quarter included a store opening plan that remains on schedule and store openings in the current year that outperformed company expectations, Garden Botanika said.
The company currently operates 244 stores in the United States.
